import React,{useEffect}from'react';function RadomColor(_ref){var isRadomPage=_ref.isRadomPage;var init=function init(){//顏色字串
var colorStr='';function color(){var r=function r(){return Math.floor(Math.random()*256);};return colorStr='rgb('+r()+','+r()+','+r()+')';}var Height=window.screen.height*0.8;var Width=window.screen.width;var ulHeight=(Height-110)/8;var ulWidth=Width*0.9;var liWidth=ulWidth*0.9/8;//ul
for(var i=1;i<9;i++){var ul=document.createElement('ul');document.querySelector('.RadomColor').appendChild(ul).style.width=ulWidth+'px';}//li 
for(var j=0;j<8;j++){var x=document.querySelector('.RadomColor').querySelectorAll('ul');for(var k=0;k<x.length;k++){var li=document.createElement('li');color();document.querySelector('.RadomColor').querySelectorAll('ul')[k].appendChild(li).style.height=ulHeight+'px';document.querySelector('.RadomColor').querySelectorAll('ul')[k].appendChild(li).style.width=liWidth+'px';document.querySelector('.RadomColor').querySelectorAll('ul')[k].appendChild(li).style.backgroundColor=colorStr;}}//click 
document.addEventListener('click',function(event){var targetElement=event.srcElement.localName;if(targetElement==='li'){color();event.srcElement.style.backgroundColor=colorStr;}});};useEffect(function(){init();},[]);return React.createElement("div",{className:"RadomColor",style:{display:isRadomPage?'block':'none'}});}export default RadomColor;
